trans-unit.source: A collection of objects stored in session state.
trans-unit.target: 儲存在工作階段狀態的物件集合。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The SessionStateItemCollection class is used to manage session-state variable values indexed by a variable name or by numerical index.
trans-unit.target: SessionStateItemCollection 類別用來管理工作階段狀態變數值的變數名稱或數值索引編製索引。

trans-unit.source: The session-state variables are exposed to ASP.NET application code using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> class, which is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>.
trans-unit.target: 工作階段狀態變數都會公開至 ASP.NET 應用程式程式碼使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>類別，這使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page></xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>對其進行存取</xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> class calls the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer> class, which manages session-state variable values using the SessionStateItemCollection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>類別會呼叫<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer>類別，可管理工作階段狀態變數的值，使用 SessionStateItemCollection。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new, empty <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的空白<xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> class is used to manage session-state variable values indexed by a variable name or by numerical index.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>類別用來管理工作階段狀態變數值的變數名稱或數值索引編製索引。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: The session-state variables are exposed to ASP.NET application code using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> class, which is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>.
trans-unit.target: 工作階段狀態變數都會公開至 ASP.NET 應用程式程式碼使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>類別，這使用<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page></xref:System.Web.HttpContext></xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>對其進行存取</xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState> class calls the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer> class, which manages session-state variable values using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>類別會呼叫<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer>類別，可管理使用的工作階段狀態變數值<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionStateContainer> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>

trans-unit.source: Removes all values and keys from the session-state collection.
trans-unit.target: 從工作階段狀態集合中移除所有的值和索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection"></xref> collection from a storage location that is written to using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize*> method.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection"></xref>從撰寫為使用儲存體位置的集合<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize*>方法。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize*>

trans-unit.source: The Deserialize method can be used to read the contents of a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> collection from the session store.
trans-unit.target: 還原序列化方法可以用來讀取的內容<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>從工作階段的存放區的集合。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: To write the contents of a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> object to the session store, use the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 要寫入的內容<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>物件至工作階段存放區，使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> used to read the serialized collection from a stream or encoded string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>用來從資料流讀取序列化的集合，或編碼字串。</xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection"></xref> collection populated with the contents from a storage location that is written to using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize*> method.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection"> </xref>填入寫入使用的儲存體位置中的內容集合<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize*>方法。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Serialize*>

trans-unit.source: The session state information is invalid or corrupted
trans-unit.target: 工作階段狀態資訊是無效或損毀

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the collection has been marked as changed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出集合是否已標示為已變更。

trans-unit.source: The Dirty property is used to indicate whether the contents of the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> collection have changed.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的屬性用來指出是否內容<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>集合已變更。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: The Dirty property is set to `true` when an object value is set or added to the collection using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Item%2A> property and when one or more object values are removed from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Clear%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 已變更的屬性設定為`true`設定或加入至集合的物件值時<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Item%2A>屬性和一或多個物件的值從集合移除的時<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Remove%2A>， <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Clear%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Dirty property is also set to `true` when a mutable object is retrieved from the collection using the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Item%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在 Dirty 屬性也會設為`true`可變動物件的集合使用的擷取時<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Item%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Deserialize%2A> method to populate a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> collection results in the Dirty property being set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Deserialize%2A>方法來填入<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>Dirty 屬性的集合結果設為`false`。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Deserialize%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection"></xref> contents have been changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection"></xref>內容已變更，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to read all the key names in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可以用來讀取集合中的所有索引鍵名稱的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can iterate through the variable names in the session-state collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可逐一查看工作階段狀態集合中之變數名稱。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value in the collection by numerical index.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值索引集合中的值。

trans-unit.source: The numerical index of the value in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中值的數值索引。

trans-unit.source: The value in the collection stored at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 儲存在指定的索引集合中的值。

trans-unit.source: If the specified key is not found, attempting to get it returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, and attempting to set it creates a new element using the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到指定的索引鍵，嘗試取得它傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，並嘗試將它設定建立使用指定的索引鍵的新項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value in the collection by name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，在集合中，依名稱。

trans-unit.source: The key name of the value in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 集合中值的索引鍵的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value in the collection with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定名稱的集合中的值。

trans-unit.source: If the specified key is not found, attempting to get it returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, and attempting to set it creates a new element using the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到指定的索引鍵，嘗試取得它傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，並嘗試將它設定建立使用指定的索引鍵的新項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the variable names for all values stored in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得儲存在集合中的所有值的變數名稱集合。

trans-unit.source: Each key is a string that represents a variable name for a value stored in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 每個索引鍵是字串，表示集合中所儲存的值的變數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection> collection that contains all the collection keys.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>集合，其中包含所有集合索引鍵。</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.NameObjectCollectionBase.KeysCollection>

trans-unit.source: Deletes an item from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中刪除項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> collection does not contain an element with the specified `name`, the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>集合未包含具有指定的項目`name`，集合維持不變。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to delete from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中刪除的項目名稱。

trans-unit.source: Deletes an item at a specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 從集合中刪除指定索引處的項目。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> collection does not contain an element with the specified `name`, the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>集合未包含具有指定的項目`name`，集合維持不變。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: No exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 擲不回任何例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要從集合中移除之項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Writes the contents of the collection to a <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 將集合的內容寫入至<xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>。</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>

trans-unit.source: The Serialize method can be used to write the contents of a <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> collection to the session store.
trans-unit.target: Serialize 方法可以用來寫入的內容<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>階段存放區的集合。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a serialized <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection> object from the session store, use the <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Deserialize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要擷取序列化<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>物件從工作階段存放區，使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Deserialize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection.Deserialize%2A> </xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> used to write the serialized collection to a stream or encoded string.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>用來將序列化的集合寫入資料流或編碼字串。</xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>
